meanings.definition: The quality or state of being submissive.
meanings.sent1: Her submissivenesses in the classroom made her a favorite among teachers.
meanings.sent2: His submissivenesses in the workplace often led to him being taken advantage of.
meanings.sent3: The cat's submissivenesses towards the playful puppy was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The submissivenesses of the waves to the pull of the moon created a calming rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The submissivenesses of the character to the villain added depth to the story.

meanings.definition: The act of submitting to the authority or control of another.
meanings.sent1: The submissivenesses of the soldiers to their commanding officer was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: She showed her submissivenesses by following the rules without question.
meanings.sent3: The robot's submissivenesses to its programming sometimes led to comical errors.
meanings.sent4: The submissivenesses of the river to the dam changed the landscape drastically.
meanings.sent5: The submissivenesses of the employee to the strict boss was evident in every action.
